rainfalls:
Rainfall Advisory No. 9 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 11:00 AM, 04 July 2025(Friday)



Light to moderate rains are expected over Nueva Ecija and Bulacan.



Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Bataan, Tarlac, Pampanga and Zambales(Cabangan, San Felipe, San Marcelino, San Narciso, San Antonio, Subic, Castillejos, Olongapo, Botolan) and may affect nearby areas.



The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 2:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
